Html:
Hi.  Considering using PHPExcel in a project. 

On the examples page, when we tried to do a print or print preview in Excel 2007 or Excel viewer, Excel crashed. 

I was able to open them in open office, then save them as xls and it printing worked in excel.

Any ideas?

Ups... Those files on the example were created using a very old version of PHPExcel. I have replaced the files 01simple.xlsx, 02types.xlsx, ... as generated by PHPExcel 1.7.1.

Now the print preview bug should be gone.
